subject: Junit 4.1 and Anthill
msgSnippet: Hi, My question pertains to using the annotation based unit tests and test suites with Anthill. I am using Eclipse 3.2, Java 1.5, Junit 4.1, Ant 1.6.5, and
messageBody:
Hi,

My question pertains to using the annotation based unit tests and test suites with Anthill.

I am using Eclipse 3.2, Java 1.5, Junit 4.1, Ant 1.6.5, and Anthill. Currently I have many junit tests and test suites written in the Junit 3.8. These run fine in all environments. What I would like to do is use the Junit 4.1 annotation based testing and test suites. I have created several test classes and a test suite to run the test classes. Eclipse will run the annotation based Junit 4.1 test suite without error. When I try to run the new test suite on Anthill, they tests run correctly but the test names all appear as 'Unknown'. I am at a loss to why.

I have search Junit's and Anthill's documentation to no avail. Also I have initiated numerous searches on goggle, but I have not found anyone with a similar problem.

Does anyone have any suggestions?

Thanks, -Michael-
